messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Homestar Runner party
messages.msgSnippet: WHAT good ideas!: -=- My kids suggest musical chairs with StrongBad singing.  A StrongBad pinata.  A Pom-Pom cake.  Fluffy Puff marshmallows.  Pin the Tail on
messages.messageBody:
WHAT good ideas!:
-=-




My kids suggest musical chairs with StrongBad singing. A StrongBad
pinata. A Pom-Pom cake. Fluffy Puff marshmallows. Pin the Tail on
StrongSad. A game based on the "thing in the bag" episode--put some
random stuff in a paperbag and have people reach in and feel them
and guess what they are.
-=-

These are really good. Marty's birthday is in a couple of weeks...

Sandra

messages.subject: Homestar Runner party
messages.msgSnippet: My kids suggest musical chairs with StrongBad singing.  A StrongBad pinata.  A Pom-Pom cake.  Fluffy Puff marshmallows.  Pin the Tail on StrongSad.  A game
messages.messageBody:
My kids suggest musical chairs with StrongBad singing. A StrongBad
pinata. A Pom-Pom cake. Fluffy Puff marshmallows. Pin the Tail on
StrongSad. A game based on the "thing in the bag" episode--put some
random stuff in a paperbag and have people reach in and feel them
and guess what they are.

Happy Birthday to Rowan from Corrina and David!!
